content: **knitted hat in drops lima and drops kid-silk or drops puna and drops kid-silk piece is knitted bottom up with folding edge and cables ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern li-176 yarn group b + a ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** s/m - l/xl head circumference approx 54/56 - 58/60 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-150 g colour 0100 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-50 g colour 01 off white or use drops puna from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 100-100 g colour 01 off white and use drops kid-silk from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 25-50 g colour 01 off white **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 40 cm drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm drops double pointed needles size 4 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need circular needle of 80 cm **knitting gauge** 19 stitches in width and 25 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 4 mm and 1 strand each quality = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
